mutants.code:
def calculate_min_cost_and_max_length(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case['N']
        Q = case['Q']
        v = case['v']
        queries = case['queries']
        sv = sorted(v)
        d = defaultdict(int)
        c = Counter(v)
        for i in range(N):
            if i and sv[i] == sv[i - 1]:
                continue
            d[sv[i]] = i
        case_results = []
        for (x, y) in queries:
            x += 1
            y -= 1
            m = y
            sm = x
            if v[x] > v[y]:
                m = x
                sm = y
            min_cost = v[m] - v[sm] + y - x
            max_length = d[v[m]] - d[v[sm]] + c[v[m]]
            case_results.append((min_cost, max_length))
        results.append(case_results)
    return results

def calculate_min_cost_and_max_length(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case['N']
        Q = case['Q']
        v = case['v']
        queries = case['queries']
        sv = sorted(v)
        d = defaultdict(int)
        c = Counter(v)
        for i in range(N):
            if i and sv[i] == sv[i - 1]:
                continue
            d[sv[i]] = i
        case_results = []
        for (x, y) in queries:
            x -= 1
            y -= 1
            m = y
            sm = x
            if v[x] != v[y]:
                m = x
                sm = y
            min_cost = v[m] - v[sm] + y - x
            max_length = d[v[m]] - d[v[sm]] + c[v[m]]
            case_results.append((min_cost, max_length))
        results.append(case_results)
    return results

        results.append(case_results)
    return results

def calculate_min_cost_and_max_length(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        N = case['N']
        Q = case['Q']
        v = case['v']
        queries = case['queries']
        sv = sorted(v)
        d = defaultdict(int)
        c = Counter(v)
        for i in range(N):
            if i and sv[i] == sv[i - 1]:
                continue
            d[sv[i]] = i
        case_results = []
        for (x, y) in queries:
            x -= 1
            y -= 1
            m = y
            sm = x
            if v[x] > v[y]:
                m = x
                sm = y
            min_cost = v[m] * v[sm] + y - x
            max_length = d[v[m]] - d[v[sm]] + c[v[m]]
            case_results.append((min_cost, max_length))
        results.append(case_results)
    return results
